author: Jason Owens
title: Kyrie Irving not expected to be cleared for home games by planned change to NYC vaccine mandate
description: Vaccine requirements appear on the way out in New York. Will Irving be cleared in time for the playoffs?
content:
Planned changes to New York's vaccine mandates might be a step toward Kyrie Irving playing home games. But they're not expected to clear his path.
